name: Bandit Kings of Ancient China
description:
Bandit Kings of Ancient China is a RPG, strategy and simulation game developed by KOEI. It came out on 01-01-1989. It was published by Koei. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Bandit Kings of Ancient China on Commodore / Amiga, SEGA Saturn, Classic Macintosh and PlayStation.
